name: RationalPlan Project File
summary: Learn about .XRP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XRP files may be created with RationalPlan Single Project or Multi Project and can be viewed with the free RationalPlan Project Viewer.

description: Project created with RationalPlan project management software; used for tracking project-related data, such as resources, workload, costs, and budget management; may be as a Single Project or a Multi Project file (created with RationalPlan Multi Project).
